title: Napoli vs Cagliari Bet Builder Tips – 7/1 Serie A Special, Analysis & Predictions
description: 90 minutes away from getting their hands on a fourth Serie A crown, Napoli will welcome Cagliari to the Stadio Diego Armando Maradona on Friday night. title: Raphinha hopes to retire at Barcelona after signing new contract
description: Barcelona winger Raphinha has signed a contract extension that will keep him with the LaLiga champions until 2028, the club announced on Thursday. The Brazil international, who joined Barca in 2022, was due to be out of contract in 2027 but has agreed new terms following a stellar season.
